thought.author: Master Yoda
thought.quote: “Judge me by my size, do you?”

thought.author: Evan Enke
thought.quote: "What do ya mean you dont have any cats!!"

thought.author: The Dude
thought.quote: "...Nobody calls me Lebowski. You got the wrong guy. I am the Dude, man."

thought.author: Ron Burgundy
thought.quote: "Do you know who I am?...I do not know how to put this, but, I am kind of a big deal...People know me."

thought.author: Bob Wiley
thought.quote: "Roses are red, violets are blue. I'm a schizophrenic and so am I."

thought.author: George Carlin
thought.quote: "What does it mean to pre-board? Do you get on before you get on?"

thought.author: Bill Burr
thought.quote: "You have no idea how long a year is until you’re stone sober."

thought.author: Jim Gaffigan
thought.quote: "There is the vegetarian Hot Pocket for those of us who don't want to eat meat, but would still like diarrhea."
